BEFORE:
x = self.stem(x)
        # n c h w -> n c 1 s
        x = torch.reshape(x, (x.shape[0], x.shape[1], 1, -1))
        # n c 1 s -> n s 1 c
        # x = x.permute(0, 3, 2, 1)
        x = self.mixer(x)
        x = self.avg(x)
        x = self.fc(x)
AFTER:
x = self.stem(x)
        # n c h w -> n p c
        x = x.flatten(2).transpose(1, 2)
        x = self.mixer(x)
        x = self.norm(x)
        x = x.mean(dim=1)
        x = self.head(x)
